name: Dining Table
description: A spacious dining table perfect for family meals. Crafted from high-quality wood, it features a sleek design. Its sturdy construction ensures durability and long-lasting use.

name: Honbay Leather Futon Couch
description: This futon couch offers both comfort and style. The leather finish adds a touch of elegance to any living space. Easily convertible, it's ideal for accommodating guests.

name: Cloud Sofa
description: The Cloud Sofa is designed for ultimate relaxation. Its plush cushions provide exceptional comfort. The modern design makes it a perfect addition to any living room.

name: Back Cushions Appear Plush and Soft
description: These back cushions are designed to enhance your seating comfort. They are plush and soft, perfect for any chair or sofa. Available in various colors to match your decor.

name: Parisian Bistro
description: Bring the charm of a Parisian cafe to your home with this bistro set. It includes a round table and two chairs, all crafted with elegant details. Perfect for small spaces and outdoor settings.

name: Cloud Sofa
description: The Cloud Sofa is designed for ultimate relaxation. Its plush cushions provide exceptional comfort. The modern design makes it a perfect addition to any living room.

name: Button-Tufted Headboard Bed
description: This bed features a stylish button-tufted headboard. It's designed to add a touch of elegance to your bedroom. Sturdy and comfortable, it ensures a great night's sleep.

name: Burrow Slope Sofa
description: The Burrow Slope Sofa combines modern design with maximum comfort. It features a sleek silhouette and high-quality fabric. Perfect for any contemporary living space.

description: This white plastic chair is versatile and durable. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. Easy to clean and maintain, itâ€™s a practical seating solution.

name: Article Sven Sofa
description: The Article Sven Sofa is a perfect blend of style and comfort. Its sleek design complements any modern living room. Made with high-quality materials for lasting durability.

name: Modern Chaise Lounge Chair
description: This chaise lounge chair offers a modern twist on a classic design. Perfect for relaxation and lounging. Its sleek lines and comfortable cushions make it a standout piece.

name: Dresser
description: This dresser combines functionality with style. It offers ample storage space with its multiple drawers. The sleek design fits seamlessly into any bedroom decor.

name: Tufted Lounge Chair
description: This tufted lounge chair provides a luxurious seating experience. Its elegant design adds a touch of sophistication to any room. Perfect for reading or relaxing.

name: Rocking Chair
description: This rocking chair is perfect for relaxation. Its classic design and sturdy construction ensure comfort and longevity. Ideal for living rooms, nurseries, or patios.

name: Club Chair
description: This club chair offers a comfortable and stylish seating option. Its plush cushions and sturdy frame provide excellent support. Great for any living room or study.

name: Wood Dining Chairs
description: These wood dining chairs are both elegant and durable. Crafted from high-quality wood, they complement any dining table. Comfortable seating for family and guests.

name: Cream Fabric Dining Chair
description: This cream fabric dining chair combines comfort with style. The soft fabric and sturdy frame make it a perfect dining companion. Its neutral color fits any dining room decor.

name: Light Brown Wooden Dining Table
description: This light brown wooden dining table is perfect for family gatherings. It features a solid construction and elegant design. Its spacious surface accommodates multiple diners comfortably.

name: Curved Arm Chaise Lounge
description: The curved arm chaise lounge offers a blend of comfort and style. Its elegant design is perfect for any modern living space. Ideal for reading, lounging, or napping.

name: Dark Wood Dining Set with Upholstered Chairs
description: This dining set includes a dark wood table and upholstered chairs. Perfect for formal dining settings, it combines style and functionality. The set's elegant design enhances any dining room.

name: Black Minimalist Chair
description: This black minimalist chair offers a sleek and modern look. Ideal for any contemporary space, it's both stylish and functional. The chair's lightweight design makes it easy to move.

name: Mid-Century Modern Loveseat
description: This mid-century modern loveseat adds a retro touch to any room. Its stylish design and comfortable cushions make it a great addition. Perfect for small living spaces or as an accent piece.

name: Traditional Recliner
description: This traditional recliner offers ultimate comfort and support. Its classic design fits seamlessly into any living room. The recliner's adjustable settings ensure personalized relaxation.

name: White Table Lamp
description: This white table lamp provides both style and illumination. Perfect for any room, it features a sleek design and adjustable brightness. Its neutral color blends well with any decor.
